segments.text: I forgot my cigarette today . Do you have another one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I've been smoking for over a year now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . You're new to smoking still . I've been smoking for 7 years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Many times . I'm really addicted . It's harder to stop than you think .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . I tried to quit last month , and I thought it was going to be easy , but it turns out that I'm still smoking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I highly recommend you quit soon . The longer you smoke , the harder it becomes to quit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you're right . Aright . Gotta go to class . Thanks for the cigarette . I'll talk to you later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . I'll talk to you later .
segments.speaker: S2
